headers.subject: [tosdr:2687] MyKolab fines spammers

html:
Do not abuse this Service to invade the privacy and violate the rights of others. Abuse includes also the sending of unsolicited email (“Spam”) for which you explicitly agree to pay a compensation of 0.01 CHF per incident and recipient by making use of the Service.


https://mykolab.com/tos 

Title: MyKolab fines spammers

Topic: user-info

Summary: In addition to MyKolab telling subscribers not to abuse their service to invade the privacy and violate the rights of others, they have also stated that said abuse includes sending unwanted emails. If you do, you agree to pay 0.01 CHF each time, per recipient.

Score: 50 (good)

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
